dc:title: Day by Day - January 1935
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An account of their work: visitors, helping neighbors, selling copies of the paper. Is grateful for the donations that seem to appear at the most needed times, both money and services. Says they were smote by a flea infestation.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 284 1935-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
